description: ff. 118. 175 x 130; 135 x 90 mm. 13 lin. 14th cen. (fol. 1-2 and 117-118 by a later hand). On title page (later hand) attributed to Tāj al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Durayhim, d. 762/1360; the same attribution also in ms. Ahmet III, 1404 (Fihrist al-makhṭūṭāt al-muṣawwarah, I, 555, no. 51). Ms. Qaw. I, 267 is ascribed to Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Abī al-Fatḥ, cf. Brockelmann, GAL, SN II, 165 (4c). The lists of Ibn al-Durayhimʼs works in Ibn Ḥajar, al-Durar al-kāminah, III, 106sqq. and Shawkānī, al-Badr al-ṭāliʻ (1348 H.), I, 477 do not mention this title. Ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 1882 (anon.). . Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى اعز الاسلام قوما واذل به آخرىن ... وبعد فان الباعث لى على ما ذکرت ... انتى رأىت اعدا الله النصارى من اهل الذمة قد تمکنوا فى البلاد
